name: vulture.exe
description:
" Asuka is invited to an awards ceremony whose motivations claim to be sparking a cultural flame among the country’s youth. Finding an irresistible offer scribbled inside the sealed envelope, she reluctantly accepts. Tragedy strikes as her and fifteen others are whisked away to an isolated building and forced to play a deadly game.
Four executioners are hiding amongst them, and they have to find out who they are before they’re all killed. " OVERVIEW

vulture.exe is a silent visual novel centered around sixteen individuals trapped in a deadly "executioner game", drawing heavy inspiration from classic party games such as mafia and werewolf. It will be released episodically as chapters are completed. Currently, only the prologue is finished.

The game is text and visual based, with very little gameplay. Prepare for a lot of reading.

DETAILS

> A linear, focused story.
> No music or sound effects, allowing you to decide the mood for yourself.
> An ever-dwindling cast of colorful characters.
> All original art and graphics.
> Currently  only available for Windows computers. Apologies.

This game contains heavy subject matter and visual depictictions of gore. CREDITS

>Made with: RPG Maker MV
> Created by: K2 Studios
